name: LD45 - Cultivation
description:
Grow a tree together.  Take your time.  Enjoy the sights.

Controls

ActionTree CanopyTree RootsToggle Grow and Absorb Energy10

We enjoyed our second jam together even more than our first!  Hope you enjoy the game!  

If you'd like us to play your LD45 game too, just enter it into the below form.
